abstract: Home Depot, the home improvement retailer that ousted its chief executive in early 2007, gave his successor compensation valued at $8.28 million last year, even as profit slid 24 percent.
snippet: Home Depot, the home improvement retailer that ousted its chief executive in early 2007, gave his successor compensation valued at $8.28 million last year, even as profit slid 24 percent.
lead_paragraph: HOME DEPOT CHIEF’S PAY Home Depot, the home improvement retailer that ousted its chief executive in early 2007, gave his successor compensation valued at $8.28 million last year, even as profit slid 24 percent.
